altername_name: Fire Emblem: The Reincarnation of Light and Dark
圣火降魔录外传 光与暗的轮回
火焰之纹章外传 光与暗的轮回
name: Fire Emblem: the Cycle of Light and Dark
overview: Released in 2002, Fire Emblem: The Cycle of Light and Dark (圣火降魔录外传:光与暗的轮回) is an original title for the Game Boy Colour, recycling graphical and gameplay elements from the Fire Emblem series. The battle and map sprites are ripped straight from the NES Fire Emblem titles, while the portraits are from the SNES titles. The game, which is only available in Chinese, spans 20+ chapters. One of the unique features of this game is a fairly well-built Skills system, which arguably outperforms that used in any Fire Emblem. Besides the lack of immediate creativity, flaws include repetitive music samples beyond the first couple of maps and a huge difficulty peak towards the endgame.
